Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to authorizing the city of Schenectady, county of Schenectady, to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands
Summary: Authorizes the city of Schenectady, county of Schenectady, to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands for the purpose of relocating historic homes that are at a high risk of flooding.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the city of Schenectady to alienate certain parcels of land used as parkland and to provide other parcels of land to replace such parkland
